column1: Beldir was the son of [[Belen]]. He had one son himself, [[Belemir]], who was born in {{FA

In the early versions of the genealogy of the House of Bëor there was no mention of Beldir, who did not appear until the revisions made after after publication of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' in the 1950s.<ref name=WJBeor>{{WJ
